title: season 6 placement
body: k so i was silv 2 in season 5 and i just finished placement with 9-1. Guess what I got? silv 4 WHOOHOOOO FeelsBadMan

replies.body: I've been seeing this everywhere, my friend and i were both high mmr gold, aka gold 2/1 and he was placed in bronze 1 with 1400 Mmr according to Op.gg (knowing full well its not 100% accurate) Just doesn't make sense that the Soft reset has a negative effect on your mmr. Sure placing lower makes sense but not two whole devisions

Ranked is a soft reset. So you almost ALWAYS end up lower than where you were. Now had you done that well on a brand new unranked account you probably would have gotten higher. Pushing mid to high gold with 9-1.

I dont know why anyone below Plat are complaining anyway. Riot added the new "promo helper" thing anyway so most people will be high silver to gold within a few months

Silver 2 S5 to Bronze 1 S6 here
#RektTheBronzes #mwahaha
you must have had bad mmr
